scripts.build:web: rm -rf www && mkdir -p www && cp -R index.html manifest.json sw.js data scripts styles assets icons www/
scripts.cap:sync: npm run build:web && npx cap sync
scripts.cap:android: npm run build:web && npx cap open android
scripts.cap:ios: npm run build:web && npx cap open ios
scripts.android:aab: npm run cap:sync && cd android && ./gradlew bundleRelease
scripts.android:apk: npm run cap:sync && cd android && ./gradlew assembleRelease
